Subject: Hot Rod Returns/Help For KitKat
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He heard KitKat. He ran to the room in a panic. He found her.
"Oh my god!" He picked her up, and took her to a CR.
"Hold on. Dont die on me!"
He put her in and set it for toxins and vireses. He monetered her
recovery.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod saw a pod go by with Diamond. He reconized her.
"Hot Rod, MAXIMIZE!"
He transformed, and fired a rocket at it.
"Now where are you going in such a hurry?"

::Demolition::

With Angel Prime gone, he went to the CR's and started repairing.
